"; } std::regex word_regex("(\w+)"); auto words_begin = std::sregex_iterator(s.begin(), s.end(), word_regex); auto words_end = std::sregex_iterator(); std::cout << "Found " << std::distance(words_begin, words_end) << " words
"; const int N = 6; std::cout << "Words longer than " << N << " characters:
"; for (std::sregex_iterator i = words_begin; i !
